column1: Sangod is a city and a municipality in Kota district in the Indian state of Rajasthan.Sangod is also a Legislative Assembly Bharat Singh Kundanpur is the Member of Legislative Assembly (MLA) from Sangod. Current SHO of sangod police station is Bharat Singh. Devki Nandan Rathore is Chairman of Municipal Corporation of Sangod.
Sangod is located at 24.92°N 76.28°E﻿ / 24.92; 76.28 on the Ujad river. It has an average elevation of 256 metres (839 feet).

column3: 645. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Sangod has an average literacy rate of 64%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 76%
column5: and female literacy is 52%. In Sangod
column6: 17% of the population is under 6 years of age.
